title: A Blade Runner discovers something that can change the future of replicans and humans.
review: A worthy sequel of the classical Blade Runner movie, it builds on slow story telling and amazingly beautiful scenes. The story is well built and have good twists in it. Ryan Gosling is amazing and the other actors and actresses are also doing great job. If you like spectacular movies, what makes you think for days you will love this masterpiece. A must see for all sci-fi fans.
